sense.gloss: donburi, bowl of meat, fish, etc. served over rice
tempura donburi, tempura served over a bowl of rice
(in comedy) repeating the same gag or silly line
katsudon, pork cutlet served on top of a bowl of rice
eel donburi, bowl of rice topped with eel
oyakodon, bowl of rice topped with chicken and egg
threesome including a mother and her daughter
rough estimate, sloppy accounting, slapdash bookkeeping
bowl of rice with food on top
vinegared rice topped with sliced raw tuna

sdata.j: ↑国↑↓くに↓の↑経済↑↓けいざい↓だって、↑家庭↑↓かてい↓の↑経済↑↓けいざい↓だって、↑個人↑↓こじん↓の↑経済↑↓けいざい↓だって、↑丼勘定↑↓どんぶりかんじょう↓でいいものではない。
sdata.e: Whether it's national economics, family economics, or personal economics, it's not something where sloppy accounting is good enough.

words.gloss: tempura donburi, tempura served over a bowl of rice
katsudon, pork cutlet served on top of a bowl of rice
